root.name: Keyboardmania
root.description: OverviewReleased in arcades, two players use 24-key keyboards to play the piano or keyboards sections of various songs. Notes are displayed as small bars that scroll downward above an image of the keyboard. As with most rhythm games, timing is essential, as the player must play the matching key when the note descends to the red play line. Each arcade cabinet has two screen, one for each player.VersionsKeyboardmania was also released for Playstation 2 and PC, each shipping with a modified controller that attempted to mirror the arcade controllers. Soundtrack Soundtrack cover 1. BURNIN' 2. 24TH D,THE 3. My Love/ Q-Mex 4. Confusion 5. All the love/ Lala Moore 6. Shining Dream/ MAGIC Project 7. Fairy Tale 8. Let's go back home 9. Shake! 10. MR.C.C. 11. CRISIS OF LOVE/ T.R.S.R 12. Brain child 13. Armajiro 14. Dicky's Theme 15. Pf Concerto No.2 16. kimi ni ai ni yukou/ Pictures Of Lily 17. Shiritori/ Fantastic factory 18. Keyboard Man 19. Mighty Guy/ CHIHOMI 20. Henry Henry 21. Morning Music 22. Mighty Guy/ CHIHOMI 23. Henry Henry
